name: Pattern Demos
description: This demo is a collection of patterns and solutions coming from real-world projects ready to copy into your own projects. Current solutions include locking, error-handling by administrators, scheduled jobs and others.

descriptions.value: This demo is a collection of patterns and solutions coming from real-world projects ready to copy into your own projects. Current solutions include locking, error-handling by administrators, scheduled jobs and others.

Diese Demo ist eine Sammlung von Mustern und Lösungen, die aus realen Projekten stammen und die in eigene Projekte kopiert werden können. Die aktuellen Lösungen umfassen Locking, Fehlerbehandlung durch Administratoren, Jobausführung und anderes.
